sentences.en: By 2011 debris in the center of the ring, which is about a light-year in diameter, was blazing more intensely as the supernova entered a new stage of stellar demise.
sentences.cn: 到2011年为止，因为这个超新星进入了星球消亡的新阶段，所以这环物质中心直径大约是一光年的碎片燃烧的更加强烈了。

sentences.en: Eisenhower was intensely aware of the need for long-range planning.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔深谙长远规划的必要性。

sentences.en: Gould was an intensely private individual.
sentences.cn: 古德以前是个极为孤僻的人。

sentences.en: He was intensely eager, indeed avid, for wealth.
Her parents were intensely ambitious for her and her younger sister.
sentences.cn: 她的父母对她和她妹妹有着很高的期望.

sentences.en: His air of calm superiority annoyed her intensely.
sentences.cn: 他不动声色的优越感让她极其烦恼.

sentences.en: I could feel that a man was watching me very intensely.
sentences.cn: 我能感觉到有人正紧盯着我看。

sentences.en: I do not feel it intensely in my genitals alone, but I do feel it there as well as the rest of my body and…in my mouth…”.
sentences.cn: 使用男性阳具我都没有这种强烈的感觉，但是在那里及身体的其他部位..还有嘴巴..我却感觉到了。

sentences.en: I found the story intensely moving.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这个故事非常感人.

sentences.en: I was intensely curious to know more about him.
sentences.cn: 我迫不及待地想更多地了解他的情况.

sentences.en: Steve was intensely curious about the world I came from.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫非常想了解我以前生活的那个世界。

sentences.en: Susan and Deborah share an intensely selfish, egotistic streak.
sentences.cn: 苏珊和德博拉两个人都极端自私和自我。

sentences.en: The fast-food business is intensely competitive.
The intensely critical spirit is often the narrow - minded and ignorant one.
sentences.cn: 极爱吹毛求疵的人往往是心胸狭窄和无知的人.
